E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 5/1/1973
Subject: Progress of Milciades Olivo
Dear Sir,
Milciades Olivo has nothing more to prove at AA Trois-Rivieres Aigles!
He has an ERA of 0.41 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/1/1973
Subject: Progress of Fred Cambria
Dear Sir,
Fred Cambria is doing pretty good at AA Trois-Rivieres Aigles!
He has an ERA of 2.08, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/1/1973
Subject: Progress of Jim M. Hughes
Dear Sir,
Jim M. Hughes has an ERA of 2.27 at AA Trois-Rivieres Aigles!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/1/1973
Subject: Progress of Fred Rico
Dear Sir,
Fred Rico has an AVG of .337 at AA Trois-Rivieres Aigles!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director
